attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop the nanny state, stop political correctness gone mad, stop making us afraid to open our mouth, what happened to freedom of speech, toughen up prisons instead of making them into holiday camps, make crime "not" pay,zero tollerance on crime,tougher sentences on crimes and life to mean lfe.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
